definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
variant of 觸霉頭|触霉头[chu4 mei2 tou2]
the old man lost his mare, but it all turned out for the best (idiom); fig. a blessing in disguise/it's an ill wind that blows nobody any good/also written 塞翁失馬焉知非福|塞翁失马焉知非福
pinyin: sai4 weng1 shi1 ma3 an1 zhi1 fei1 fu2

definition: (slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]
waiting on tiptoes and craning one's neck (idiom)/to look forward eagerly/to long for/also pr. [qiao4 zu2 yin3 ling3]
impossible to separate/impossible to disentangle/cannot take time out
bitten by a snake in one year, fears the well rope for ten years (idiom); once bitten twice shy

definition: (idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says
